name: Cursed Gold (FunnyLookinDice)
description:
GameDev.TV 2021 GameJam.

This happens to be my FIRST GameJam and its been great fun!

"All that glistens isn't Gold" was the theme and that screamed pirates from the get go.

All assets to be used are free from Unity's asset store and some I found from other also free licence sites.

You play a pirate in a top Down point and click, scouring the glistening waves for a lost treasure  once belonging to a dead pirate lord. 

Collecting all of his gold however, put you in the sights of an undead pirate lord seeking revenge!

Please take a look and have a play and I would love some feedback on what I could have done better.

https://github.com/WayneWood1981/Sink-um
